de.lmu.ifi.dbs.jfeaturelib

Class Progress

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.jfeaturelib.Progress

  • public class Progress
extends Object
    The Progress class can be used in situations where an algorithm should fire updates about its progress. Valid progress values are in the range of [0,100]. Subsequent events should have increasing progress values.
    Author:
    graf
